original_title: ‘You never want to leave:’ TikTok employees raise concerns about the app’s impact on teens in newly unsealed video | CNN Business
article_summary: TikTok faces allegations of prioritizing addictiveness over user safety, as internal videos reveal concerns about the app's impact on young users' mental health. North Carolina's Attorney General has sued TikTok for deceptive practices, and a judge has denied the company's motion to dismiss the lawsuit. TikTok maintains its commitment to user safety and has implemented various features to support teen well-being.</s>
